translation.en: [narrator] For thousands of years,
Buddha oversaw the universe.
And the Immortal Ones in heaven
and kings in hell

Demons walked among us,

We respected the gods, and we followed the rules

[narrator] Meet
trouble.

translation.de: Wer kann bei Dämonen Angst und Schrecken vermehren?

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
♪ Who's the simian you'll find shimmying Up to the top ♪
translation.de: Welcher Affe gibt nie auf, ist immer vorn?

translation.en: ♪ And you know he won't stop Till he's won? ♪
translation.de: Und wer kämpft voller Mut bis zum Sieg?

translation.en: ♪ That's right, it's the Monkey King! ♪
Eh, you were a little flat. Ya!
[Lin] Yeah! Monkey King!
[Dragon King] Hm. It appears the ape didn't succumb to our fiery little minx as I'd hoped.
translation.de: Der Affe unterlag offenbar nicht wie erhofft unserem feurigen Biest.

translation.en: Time to move. Are you sufficiently moisturized, Your Grace?
You know what happens in the dry night air. [Dragon King] Hm. Good point.
Onward!
Here's your medal. Yes.
So, where are the Immortal Ones?
-Yeah, we were promised gods! -They're coming. Move.
[clears throat] One hundred demons defeated.
Wow. What an accomplishment.
The Immortal Ones can welcome me with open arms now.
translation.de: Die Unsterblichen können mich jetzt empfangen.

translation.en: I said now!
Now? Hello? This thing on?
They're here! See, peasants!
translation.de: Sie sind da! Seht, ihr Bauern!

translation.en: Behold as I ascend!
translation.de: Sehet, wie ich in den Himmel emporsteige!

translation.en: -[Dragon King] You! -Ho ho!
You are no hero! You're a thief!
translation.de: Du bist kein Held! Sondern ein Dieb!

translation.en: Aw, you're not the Immortal Ones.
Uh-oh.
That is mine!
-What's wrong, Stick? You know this chump? -[Stick groans]
translation.de: Was ist, Stock, kennst du den?

translation.en: Stick? You never talked to me. Hey, hey, hey, hey. Who are you anyway?
translation.de: -Stock? Zu mir hast du nie gesprochen. -Hey! Wer bist du?

translation.en: I am the undersea ruler of the--
-What? -Oh, look at his face.
-Low humidity. Arid climate. -[villagers] Ew!
translation.de: Niedrige Luftfeuchtigkeit. Trockenes Klima. Schaut weg! Nein.

translation.en: Don't look at me! No, no, no. Be right back.
translation.de: Niedrige Luftfeuchtigkeit. Trockenes Klima. Schaut weg! Nein. Komme gleich.

translation.en: [Dragon King] So invigorating.
-…undersea ruler of the dragon kingdom. -What? Come on.
And you, sir, stole my stick.
No, I didn't. I found it at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.de: Ich fand ihn auf dem Meeresgrund.

translation.en: Right in the middle of some tacky palace.
Tacky? Once I reclaim my stick,
translation.de: -In einem kitschigen Palast. -Was? Hab ich meinen Stab zurück,

translation.en: you and all these air-breathers will suffer my… my…
translation.de: werden du und die ganzen anderen Luftatmer unter meiner… meiner…

translation.en: Again? Arid climate. No. Look away!
translation.de: Schon wieder? Trockenes Klima. Nein. Schaut weg!

translation.en: …suffer my wrath!
There's supposed to be a lightning crash. And there it is. [laughs]
translation.de: Eigentlich hätte es blitzen sollen. Geht doch.

translation.en: Hey, Babbo, how will we know when we're under the stick?
translation.de: Woher wissen wir, wann wir unterm Stock sind?

translation.en: Easy. The stick will be right above us.
How will we know we took the right stick? [scoffs] There's only one choice.
translation.de: -Wie wählen wir den richtigen? -Ist nur einer da.

translation.en: But what if we choose wrong, Babbo?
translation.de: Was, wenn wir falsch auswählen, Babbo?

translation.en: Look at that armor.
Who even wears brass with gold?
translation.de: Wer trägt schon Messing zu Gold?

translation.en: Look, buddy, I hear ya. You love my stick. Everyone loves the stick.
translation.de: Hör mal. Ich verstehe ja. Du liebst meinen Stock. Wie jeder.

translation.en: But no one appreciates the stick like I do.
translation.de: Aber niemand schätzt den Stock so wie ich.

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs urgently] -Quiet! The grown-ups are talking.
And now you're ruining my exclusive ceremony.
Point is, Stick is not going anywhere.
translation.de: Fest steht, Stock geht nirgends hin.

translation.en: -Ain't that right, Stick? Buddy? -[henchman 2] Ow!
-Uh-oh. -Hey, are they with--
-[dramatic music plays] -Stick, stay strong! I'm coming! Oh no!
[Monkey King] Hang on, Stick!
What? [groans]
Babbo, I'm gonna get sick!
Stick, left!
And to the right!
Ha ha! You missed!
Stick, darling, it's Dragon.
translation.de: -Stock, Schatz, hier ist dein Drache. -Er gehört mir!

translation.en: -He's mine! -Jump in the tub!
translation.de: -Stock, Schatz, hier ist dein Drache. -Er gehört mir! -Ab in die Wanne! -Er hört nur auf mich.

translation.en: He only listens to me, flaky.
translation.de: -Ab in die Wanne! -Er hört nur auf mich.

translation.en: I don't see a ring on it, honey! [grunts]
Itching! Flaking!
Of course! An avalanche.
-Hit the brake! -[Monkey King] Fun ride, huh?
-[henchmen groan] -[Monkey King] See ya!
-[henchman 2] Babbo! -[Babbo] Curse you, gravity!
Ha ha! Monkey King reigns supreme!
[Dragon King] Stick!
Catch me!
My palace is not tacky!
[Lin panting] Gotcha!
Dragon King?
Fear not, little girl. The villain is gone.
translation.de: Keine Angst, Kleine. Der Bösewicht ist weg.

translation.en: Maybe you're not as useless as I thought. -So, do I have the job? -Um…
translation.de: -Womöglich bist du nicht so nutzlos. -Hab ich den Job?

translation.en: Nope.
[Lin] Oh, come on.
Twenty minutes, and still no invite from the Jade Emperor.
translation.de: Zwanzig Minuten, und kein Piep vom Jade-Kaiser.

translation.en: -What am I missing? -[murmurs]
Immortality! Of course. It's right in the name.
translation.de: Unsterblichkeit? Ja! Steckt ja schon im Wort!

translation.en: To become an Immortal One, I need immortality! [Lin] Maybe I can help.
translation.de: -Ich brauche Unsterblichkeit! -Vielleicht kann ich da helfen.

translation.en: Okay, look, kid. You see this?
Your palm?
No! I mean, yes. But no. This here is me.
translation.de: Nein. Ich meine, ja. Aber nein. Das hier bin ich.

translation.en: Okay?
And this tiny thing is you.
translation.de: Und dieses kleine Ding bist du.

translation.en: -Get it now? -Huh? [Monkey King] I'm the universe hand,
translation.de: Jetzt klar? Ich bin die Universums-Hand.

translation.en: and you're an insignificant, useless pebble.
Even a tiny pebble can make a big ripple, you know.
translation.de: Der kann auch große Wellen machen.

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just what a tiny pebble would say.
So, Stick, immortality, where do we go?
translation.de: Also, Stock, Unsterblichkeit. Wohin gehen wir?

translation.en: Really? Huh.
-But how do we get there? -[Stick hums]
A graveyard? Spooky.
Grave… Gra… -Graveyard. -You can't read.
Of course I can.
That's grass. That's the sky. That's a rock. See? Reading.
translation.de: Das ist Gras. Himmel. Stein. Siehst du? Ich lese.

translation.en: -Graveyard's that way. -Obviously.
-[Stick hums] -No, no, no, no, no. We don't need her.
translation.de: -Nein. Wir brauchen sie nicht. -Ich soll mitkommen, oder?

translation.en: -He wants me to come. Doesn't he? -Just go home, kid.
translation.de: -Nein. Wir brauchen sie nicht. -Ich soll mitkommen, oder? -Geh heim. -Geht nicht. Da gibt's Probleme.

translation.en: I can't go home. There's trouble back there,
and it made me do some things.
translation.de: Ich tat Dinge, die ich wohl nicht tun sollte.

translation.en: -Things I probably shouldn't have done. -Ooh! You killed someone?
translation.de: Ich tat Dinge, die ich wohl nicht tun sollte. -Jemand getötet? -Nein!

translation.en: I just wanna do big things someday. Like you.
translation.de: Ich will mal Großes vollbringen. Wie du.

translation.en: -I know. No. I-- -[Stick murmurs] -Yes, but-- -[Stick murmurs]
translation.de: Ich weiß. Nein. Ich… Tja, ja, aber…

translation.en: How much reading could we possibly need? -[Stick murmurs] -Fine. I said fine! [sighs]
translation.de: Wie oft wird Lesen schon gebraucht? Gut. Ich sagte, gut!

translation.en: So, assistant girl,
you coming or what?
[Lin] So, where to next?
In there? Us? How?
This. It's like an all-access VIP pass.
translation.de: Hiermit. Der ist quasi ein VIP-Pass.

translation.en: Any realm, any dimension. Even the Land of the Dead. But you're not dead.
translation.de: -Er bringt uns sogar ins Land der Toten. -Aber du bist nicht tot.

translation.en: And if all goes well, never will be. Okay. If we're gonna fit in, we gotta dress the part.
translation.de: Läuft alles gut, bleibt es so. Um nicht aufzufallen, tarnen wir uns.

translation.en: [coughs] What the heck? [Monkey King] Not heck.
Hell.
Try to keep up.
Are we even supposed to be here?
Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
See, the day you're supposed to die is recorded in the Scroll of Life and Death.
translation.de: Dein Todeszeitpunkt steht in der Schriftrolle des Lebens.

translation.en: But if my name should somehow get crossed out,
then no death registered, and guess who's immortal?
translation.de: kein Todeseintrag, wer ist dann unsterblich?

translation.en: Me! [laughs]
One more thing. Die in hell, stay in hell. So don't die.
translation.de: Ach ja. Wer in der Hölle stirbt, bleibt da. Stirb nicht.

translation.en: This is a bad idea.
[demon] Next.
Act like a ghost.
Oh yeah. Great. You're giving me chills.
translation.de: Oh ja. Klasse. Ich bekomme glatt Gänsehaut.

translation.en: King here! Coming through!
Make way. Next! Release form. [groans]
You brought a live chicken to the underworld?
translation.de: Du hast ein lebendes Huhn mitgebracht?

translation.en: No living things allowed!
We really should go now.
[scoffs] Watch and learn, Pebble.
Oh no.
That's better. Pit of Infinite Agony. Fourth floor on your right. Next!
translation.de: Besser. Kammer des Ewigen Schmerzes. Vierter Stock rechts. Nächster!

translation.en: Yes, good morning. I'd like a quick glance at the Life and Death Scrolls.
translation.de: Morgen. Ich möchte kurz in die Schriftrollen des Lebens schauen.

translation.en: Release form first.
It's in my other armor? Rejected! [growls]
-Release form. -Back to the world of the living.
Not so fast.
-As my assistant, your first duty… -[Lin groans] …is to be the sacrificial lamb.
translation.de: Als Assistentin gebührt dir die Rolle des Opferlamms.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -She's alive? Here in hell? -What? -You're alive!
translation.de: -Was soll das? -Sie lebt. In der Hölle? Du lebst!

translation.en: How scandalous!
And you cut in front of all these people?
-What? -No living things allowed!
-Oh, Monkey! -[Monkey cackles] Uh, uh, I… I'm not…
I couldn't be more dead. Fresh corpse here.
translation.de: Ich bin so was von tot. Eben gestorben.

translation.en: How did you die?
Old age. No, I mean scurvy. Earthquake? A duel. Two duels.
translation.de: Altersschwäche. Skorbut. Erdbeben? Ein Duell. Zwei Duelle.

translation.en: Here's the story.
I fell… off a cliff into a hole filled with sharks.
translation.de: Ich stürzte von einer Klippe in ein Loch voller Haie.

translation.en: Rabid sharks. And then a house fell on me,
translation.de: Tollwütige. Dann fiel ein Haus auf mich.

translation.en: and I drowned. Yeah.
Okay, you're in.
Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths. Fifth floor down the hall.
translation.de: Kammer der Lächerlichen Tode. Fünfter Stock, den Flur runter.

translation.en: Next!
-[screams] -[ghost] What a guy.
-Hey! -[screams]
Monkey! You abandoned me in the middle of hell.
translation.de: Affe! Du ließt mich in der Hölle im Stich.

translation.en: You don't leave a teammate behind.
What teammate? You're an assistant. An insignificant pebble.
translation.de: Was? Du bist Assistentin. Ein unbedeutender Kieselstein.

translation.en: -Stop calling me that. -Absolutely.
As soon as you find my scroll so I can cross my name off. Come on.
translation.de: Sowie du die Schriftrolle gefunden hast. Los.

translation.en: -[grunts] This shouldn't take long. -[Lin gasps]
[Lin] What?
Get reading.
What's your family name?
Don't have one. I was born from a rock.
translation.de: -Nachname? -Hab keinen. -Ein Stein brachte mich zur Welt. -Was?

translation.en: A rock?
More of a rock egg. The scrolls list your family history.
translation.de: Ein Steinei. In den Rollen ist die Familiengeschichte.

translation.en: I must have parents, right?
Well, I guess.
Everyone does.
Ha! Looking for your scrolls? [laughs]
My scroll? Why does he have my scroll?
You don't belong here, outsiders.
translation.de: Ihr habt hier nichts zu suchen, Eindringlinge!

translation.en: Oh ho! Time to defeat demon 101. [demon] Mighty brush! Stamp of doom!
translation.de: -Zeit, Dämon 101 zu besiegen! -Mächtiger Pinsel! Stempel der Verdammnis!

translation.en: Open! Hyah!
-[clone 1] Don't let them get away! -[clone 2] Capture them!
[clone 3] Stop the monkey!
Through 115.
-Clones, eh? -[Stick murmurs]
I can? Really? Cool!
Monkey King reigns supreme!
Bring it! [grunts]
Not the beard!
Next!
-Wait! Time-out. I'm not a part of this. -Nobody's on the bench!
-[demon] Get her! -[Monkey King] Duck!
Got 'em.
Monkey, I got 'em. This one's mine. Huh?
translation.de: Ich habe sie. Hier ist meine.

translation.en: Hey! Not yours!
What's it say about my family? [yells]
translation.de: Was steht da über meine Familie?

translation.en: It says
you don't have one.
Oh. I'm all alone?
I'm sorry, Monkey. -Which means-- -[demon grunts]
Oof! I'm an original! One of a kind!
translation.de: Ich bin ein Original! Ein Unikat. Gib mal her.

translation.en: -Give me that scroll. -Third line from the bottom.
translation.de: Ich bin ein Original! Ein Unikat. Gib mal her. -Dritte Reihe von unten. -Leg sie weg!

translation.en: Step away from the scroll, you flea-bitten, mortal lowlife! Close!
translation.de: -Dritte Reihe von unten. -Leg sie weg! Du flohzerfressener, sterblicher Abschaum. Tore zu!

translation.en: Come on!
Got it.
[grunts] Yeah, baby!
Monkey King!
Oh, her.
Ow! That hurt.
And now I'm immortal!
Even for hell, this is bad.
translation.de: Selbst für die Hölle ist das schlimm.

translation.en: What's up, Yama? Or should I say, what's down? [laughs]
translation.de: Was macht das Leben? Oder: Was macht der Tod?

translation.en: I beseech you. A rogue primate has invaded hell and-- Ow!
translation.de: Bitte. Ein böser Primat drang in die Hölle ein und…

translation.en: Hey, uh, Jade Emperor, right? Listen, great news.
translation.de: Hey, Jade-Kaiser, oder? Tolle Nachrichten. Hol die Unsterblichen.

translation.en: Get the Immortal Ones together. I'm on my way. We're gonna be neighbors.
translation.de: Hey, Jade-Kaiser, oder? Tolle Nachrichten. Hol die Unsterblichen. Ich komme. Wir werden Nachbarn.

translation.en: So you're the Monkey King. Gonna party at your banquets.
translation.de: -Du bist also der Affenkönig. -Ich feiere bei euch ab.

translation.en: -Get hammered. -Release form!
-We're gonna share battle stories. -Please. You're not one of us.
translation.de: -Wir erzählen von unseren Kämpfen. -Du bist keiner von uns.

translation.en: Actually, I am. Crossed my name out and everything.
translation.de: Doch. Mein Name ist durchgestrichen und alles.

translation.en: That only makes you half-immortal.
-Half? -You can't die of old age.
Oh, that's great! But you can still die in battle.
Don't look at me. This was your plan.
translation.de: Guck nicht so. War dein Plan.

translation.en: Well, this is new information. So, how exactly does one get full immortality?
translation.de: Das ist eine neue Information. Wie erreicht man volle Unsterblichkeit?

translation.en: You don't. Not possible.
Well, there is The Book of Everlasting Life, my lord.
translation.de: Es gibt das Buch des immerwährenden Lebens.

translation.en: -You shut your beard hole right now! -My bad.
-Stick, door! -[Stick murmurs]
Assistant, book! Monkey, stay handsome.
Whatever you do, don't let him leave with that book!
translation.de: Tu was! Er darf nicht mit dem Buch entkommen!

translation.en: Let's go.
-[Lin groans] -Uh-oh.
-[Yama grunts] -[Monkey King] Make way!
Catch him! Catch him!
No, no, no, no, no, no, no! Monkey!
Ha! Well, that was fun. You got the book?
translation.de: Das hat Spaß gemacht. Hast du das Buch?

translation.en: -Uh, um, uh… -You didn't lose it, did you?
You had one job!
One job and you blew it!
-Just messing with you! -Do you treat all your friends like this?
Friends? Whoa, okay. You're more like a teammate on my very critical mission.
translation.de: Du bist eher ein Teammitglied auf meiner äußerst wichtigen Mission.

translation.en: Well, that's better than a pebble.
All right. Moving on. See this?
This book can tell us how I can get my full immortality.
translation.de: Darin steht, wie ich Unsterblichkeit erreiche.

translation.en: -Uh… -What's it say?
Okay. Uh, it says…
Oh. "Full immortality can be attained by eating a magical peach
from the Enchanted Orchard of Everlasting Life."
translation.de: aus dem verwunschenen Obstgarten immerwährenden Lebens."

translation.en: Ooh! Where's that?
This could take a while.
And I will give you five minutes.
This monkey's insane.
Oh really?
He gets in fights, insults the gods.
He just stole a book from hell! Oh yeah, did I mention? We went to hell!
translation.de: Er stahl das aus der Hölle! Ja! Wir waren da!

translation.en: Okay, let's bring the sass down to, like, a four, okay, sweetheart?
translation.de: Ok, regeln wir das Vorlaute auf eine vier herunter. Ja?

translation.en: I can't keep this up. I can't do this.
Listen, honey, we made a deal. There's no backing out now.
translation.de: Hör zu, wir haben eine Abmachung. Es gibt jetzt kein Zurück.

translation.en: Or did you forget?
[sighs] I remember.
[Lin] I beseech you, divine dragon.
End our suffering.
Our crops are dying.
Could you please grace us with a rainstorm?
-[groans] We've been searching forever! -What?
translation.de: Wir suchen bereits ewig. -Was? -Wieso nützen die Fahndungsplakate nichts?

translation.en: Why aren't the "wanted" posters working?
But we put them up everywhere, Your Grace. There's one.
translation.de: Wir hängten sie überall auf. Da ist eins!

translation.en: What is this?
I told you to draw the monkey, you dimwit!
translation.de: Du solltest den Affen zeichnen, Schwachkopf!

translation.en: But, sire, monkeys are so much harder to draw than sticks.
translation.de: Aber die sind viel schwieriger als Stöcke.

translation.en: -No, wait, wait! -[yells] What the--
[gasps] Divine Master of Weather. Thank you for answering my call.
How dare you, a mere mortal, speak to his lordship.
-Avert your eyes. -[Lin] My apologies. We have no food here. No water.
Could you please, please send us rain?
Well, aren't you a presumptuous little snack.
translation.de: Du bist ein ganz schön frecher kleiner Snack.

translation.en: Wait, please!
I'll do anything. You must need something. An assistant. A servant.
translation.de: Ihr braucht sicher was. Eine Assistentin. Eine Dienerin.

translation.en: A human servant? Ha!
He already has two perfectly good and trusted advisors. We carry his tub.
translation.de: -Er hat zuverlässige Berater. -Wir tragen seine Wanne.

translation.en: [laughs] No! No. But perhaps our monkey would.
translation.de: Nein. Nein, aber vielleicht unser Affe.

translation.en: Monkey?
Would you lie for me? Get your paws dirty?
translation.de: -Affe? -Würdest du für mich lügen? Dir die Pfoten einsauen? Manipulativ, böse und gerissen sein?

translation.en: You'll have to be manipulative, vicious, and cunning.
translation.de: Dir die Pfoten einsauen? Manipulativ, böse und gerissen sein?

translation.en: Do you have that in you, you scrumptious, sweet little thing?
translation.de: Bekommst du das hin, du süßes Ding?

translation.en: Because when you make a deal with me, you follow through or…
translation.de: Denn, wer einen Deal mit mir macht, muss ihn durchziehen oder…

translation.en: It's chapped lips for you! [laughs]
Benbo, he eats her. Oh! Yeah, that too. [laughs]
translation.de: -Benbo, er frisst sie. -Oh! Ja, das auch.

translation.en: Okay. I accept.
Befriend a certain monkey, earn his trust, and take his stick.
translation.de: Freunde dich mit dem Affen an. Vertraut er dir, stiehl seinen Stock.

translation.en: When it's in my possession,
you'll get your rain.
He never lets the stick out of his sight.
translation.de: Er hat den Stock immer im Blick.

translation.en: The sooner it's in my grip, the faster you'll get your drip, drip, drip.
translation.de: Je schneller ich ihn habe, umso zügiger kommt die Wassergabe.

translation.en: Well, now he's got me searching this stolen book for some Orchard of Everlasting Life.
translation.de: Nun soll ich in dem Buch den Garten des immerwährenden Lebens finden.

translation.en: He's still trying to join the Immortal Ones? [laughs]
translation.de: Er will noch ein Unsterblicher werden?

translation.en: What a fool.
What should I do?
Hm. He wants an enchanted peach now, does he?
translation.de: Er will einen verwunschenen Pfirsich, oder?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll just have to put on a little show and give him one. [laughs]
translation.de: Inszenieren wir eine kleine Show und geben ihm einen.

translation.en: All you need to worry about is getting him there.
translation.de: Du musst ihn nur dorthin führen.

translation.en: You sure this is the right way to get to that fancy peach orchard?
translation.de: Sicher, dass das der richtige Weg ist?

translation.en: Yeah, definitely.
-[Monkey King grunts] Woo-hoo! -[Lin] Do you have to go top speed?
This? Ha! Please.
-I'll show you top speed. -No, no, no. I-- Hey!
Now, any personal assistant of mine really needs to be in the moment.
translation.de: Meine Assistenten müssen im Hier und Jetzt sein.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah.
You need to be more focused and pay better attention.
translation.de: Konzentrier dich mehr, pass besser auf.

translation.en: I need to know you'll always have my back.
translation.de: Auf dich muss immer Verlass sein.

translation.en: Monkey!
He's coming back. He's coming back.
[Monkey King] And my shoes perfectly shined. He's not coming back!
translation.de: -Meine Schuhe müssen glänzen. -Er kommt nicht zurück!

translation.en: It's the attention to detail that I value most.
translation.de: Die Liebe zum Detail schätze ich am meisten.

translation.en: Where to next? The hills? The desert?
translation.de: Wohin? In die Berge? In die Wüste?

translation.en: Aw, man!
Trees.
So many trees.
I could've died peacefully in my village, but, no!
translation.de: Ich hätte friedlich in meinem Dorf sterben können, aber nein!

translation.en: Chamber of Ridiculous Deaths, here I come.
translation.de: Kammer der Lächerlichen Tode, ich komme.

translation.en: ♪ Who's the handsome hero We love and adore? ♪
translation.de: Wer ist der große Held, den alle verehren?

translation.en: ♪ Monkey King! ♪
Man, that's really catchy.
Help!
-Where is she? -[Lin screams]
Oh, there you are. Did you hear any of my performance evaluation?
translation.de: Da bist du. Bekamst du was von meiner Leistungsbewertung mit?

translation.en: -[Stick murmurs] -You are crazy!
And handsome. If you're gonna be critical, be fair.
translation.de: Und gut aussehend. Wenn du mich schon kritisierst, sei fair.

translation.en: Places, everyone. Places! Almost showtime.
translation.de: Plätze einnehmen. Es geht gleich los!

translation.en: Buzz for me, Babbo. Buzz!
[groans] Must I, sire?
Come on. Sell it.
Look at my little stinger!
translation.de: Guckt mal, mein kleiner Stachel! Ich bin ja so niedlich!

translation.en: -I'm adorable! -All right, Benbo, less is more.
translation.de: Guckt mal, mein kleiner Stachel! Ich bin ja so niedlich! Weniger ist mehr.

translation.en: He's never gonna buy this. Does this look like an enchanted peach garden?
translation.de: Er kauft das nie ab. Sieht so ein verwunschener Garten aus?

translation.en: If you believe it, so will your audience. Here are the new sides.
translation.de: Glaubst du es, glauben es alle. Hier, euer Text. Lasst euch ausreden.

translation.en: Try not to step on each other's lines. Keep the scene contained.

translation.en: The toxin should take only a few moments to knock him out cold.

translation.en: Remember, the tree in the light has the peach he should bite.

translation.en: If it's hidden by night, then the fruit isn't right. Got it?

translation.en: Okay. If the tree is in light, then, um, uh…
translation.de: Ok. Wenn der Pfirsich ist im Schein…

translation.en: -It's the peach he should bite. -Oh yeah. So definitely not that tree.
translation.de: -…er soll beißen hinein. -Ja. Also nicht der Baum.

translation.en: Yes, exactly that tree.
But that tree's not white. It's more of a brown.

translation.en: No, not the color! I lit it up for you. See?

translation.en: Still nothing?
So, it's a glowing tree?

translation.en: Exactly. Wow.
And once the monkey passes out, I'll grab the stick and--

translation.en: Oh, here they come.
Everybody back to one. Hit your marks. And let's have some fun out there.

translation.en: Whoopsie-daisy!
This one? No. That one.
Ugh. This peach grove looks kinda shabby. Are you sure this is--

translation.en: Oh yeah. One bite of the magical fruit, and you get full immortality.
translation.de: Ja, ein Biss von der magischen Frucht, und du bist unsterblich.

translation.en: ♪ Behold this magic garden ♪ ♪ Full of magic nature ♪ ♪ It's the Orchard of Everlasting Life ♪
translation.de: In diesem wunderbaren, zauberhaften Garten Wächst Obst für ewig langes Leben

translation.en: ♪ We are the magic guardians ♪

translation.en: ♪ And the pollinators Of this magic orchard ♪

translation.en: ♪ Which is definitely real ♪

translation.en: I don't know why, but I like these guys. Oh yeah, totally.
translation.de: -Keine Ahnung warum, aber ich mag sie. -Ja, total.

translation.en: ♪ Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha! Handsome, hairy stranger ♪ ♪ We are the protectors ♪
translation.de: Großer Held, herrlich Wir sind die Beschützer

translation.en: ♪ Of the nectar of immortality ♪
♪ We promise there's no danger ♪ ♪ So eat a poison peach ♪
♪ I mean, the peaches that are juiciest Are in that glowing tree ♪
♪ Hopefully ♪
Stand back.
I'm not feeling anything special. Hey, do I look immortal?

translation.en: -Hm, well-- -Or maybe it's the tree over here.
That's ridiculous. The one in the light has the juiciest-- Stick to the pages!
translation.de: -Der im Licht hat die saftigsten… -Ans Skript halten!

translation.en: Maybe it's this tree. The one in the dark. That's the most delicious.
translation.de: Vielleicht der im Dunkeln. -Der hat die Köstlichsten. -Warte. Ich prüfe das.

translation.en: Hold it. Let me check.
translation.de: -Der hat die Köstlichsten. -Warte. Ich prüfe das.

translation.en: Nope. Definitely not as juicy as the one--
The tree in the dark…
Uh, what's wrong with this one?
…has the tastiest bark. [laughs]
That seems suspicious.
No, no, no, no. This is definitely the right tree.
-Eat it. -No, you eat it.
-No, you eat it. -No improv.
-You eat it first. -You eat it.
-[Monkey King] You eat it. -Come on. Just eat it. Yum.
How about at the same time?
Fine. Immortality, here I come.
I don't feel anything.
What?
Oh, wait. Maybe I do.
I feel good!
Me too!
Maybe you should just sit down.
Hey! Buzz off, lady, and mind your own…
translation.de: Schwirr ab, Kleine. Kümmere dich um deinen eigenen…

translation.en: Beeswax?
No! Beeswax.
Clear the stage. I'll take that stick. Thank you very much.
translation.de: Runter von der Bühne! Her mit dem Stab! Danke.

translation.en: -Hey, I know you. -[Lin gasps]
Oh, your skin's all cleared up. You are gorgy!
translation.de: Deine Haut ist wieder ganz glatt! So ein Süßer!

translation.en: You must be from the Dang Dynasty! Hey, hey, you gotta try these peaches, man.
translation.de: Du bist wohl aus der Wow-Dynastie! Du musst die Pfirsiche probieren.

translation.en: You idiot!
Don't you realize what's in those
translation.de: Merkst du nicht, was in diesen

translation.en: yummy, mouth-watering… [slurps]
Who wants to take a bath with me?

translation.en: I do!
Yay!
[Monkey King] We're hot-tubbing with the dragon! [Dragon King] Everyone's gonna get crazy!
translation.de: -Ein Blubberbad mit dem Drachen! -Ihr werdet voll durchdrehen!

translation.en: Oh man!
I loved those guys!
[groans] Those… Those are good people.
But the two of you are my best friends.
translation.de: Aber ihr zwei seid meine besten Freunde.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. We're not friends.
The three of us, we're family.
What just… What just happened?
Dra… Uh, Dragon?
Monkey?
You awake?
-Agh! -Wait!
Did the peaches work? Am I fully immortal now?
translation.de: Wirkten die Pfirsiche? Bin ich unsterblich?

translation.en: -Knock my head off. -What?
Take my stick and whack me in the face. It's all right. Come on, come on. Do it.
translation.de: Schlag mir mit dem Stock ins Gesicht. Los. Tu es.

translation.en: I won't even feel it.
-[groans] Fine. I'll do it myself, wuss. -[Lin snarls]
Ow!
-Those peaches were defective. -Maybe they're out of season.
translation.de: Der Pfirsich war im Eimer. -Vielleicht nicht reif. -Was? Mission gescheitert, Stock.

translation.en: -What? Our quest has failed, Stick. -[Stick groans]
-[groans] -You're still half-immortal.
I don't do half-things. Yeah, I noticed.
translation.de: -Ich mache keine halben Sachen. -Hab ich bemerkt.

translation.en: This old geezer once told me all the things I couldn't do.
translation.de: Ein alter Sack sagte mal, was ich alles nicht kann.

translation.en: That I'd wind up alone.
Yeah. "You'll never amount to anything."
translation.de: Ja. "Aus dir wird nie was werden."

translation.en: I heard that all the time back home. [sighs]
Wish I could relate.
Well, thanks for your help.
-I mean, it was mostly me. -You're leaving?
-It was nice knowing you, little girl. -But no!
[grunts] Don't go. You said we were family.
-No, I didn't. -You did.
Doesn't sound like me.
-Well, you said it. -That was just the peaches talking.
translation.de: -Klingt nicht nach mir. -Deine Worte. -Lag am Obst. -Du versprachst Großes.

translation.en: But you promised we'd do big things. We can't give up now.
translation.de: -Lag am Obst. -Du versprachst Großes. -Wir dürfen nicht aufgeben. -Wir? Wer ist wir?

translation.en: "We"? Who's this "we"?
translation.de: -Wir dürfen nicht aufgeben. -Wir? Wer ist wir?

translation.en: I'm still gonna join the Immortal Ones. -Just not with you. -[Lin groans]
translation.de: Ich werde nach wie vor ein Unsterblicher. Nur ohne dich!

translation.en: You know what? I'm starting to think that wasn't even the real peach orchard.
translation.de: Langsam glaube ich, das war nicht der echte Obstgarten.

translation.en: What? [laughs awkwardly] You think I… I deliberately brought you to the wrong place?
translation.de: Was? Denkst du, ich bringe dich absichtlich zum falschen Ort?

translation.en: L-L-Like some sort of… Like some sort of trap? You're saying I lied to you?
translation.de: Um dir eine Falle zu stellen? Ich soll gelogen haben?

translation.en: I'm not not saying it.
You know what? Go ahead. Walk away. You're so selfish.
translation.de: Weißt du, was? Geh. Du bist so ein Egoist.

translation.en: You only care about yourself.
-Well, no one else will. -Ugh! 'Cause you won't let them.
translation.de: -Sonst macht es ja keiner. -Du lässt es nicht zu.

translation.en: Someday, you really will end up all alone.
translation.de: Du wirst eines Tages wirklich mal einsam enden.

translation.en: -What are you yapping on about? -[Stick murmurs]
Who's that? Assistant, what does it say?
translation.de: Wer ist das? Assistentin, was steht da?

translation.en: "An authority on everlasting life, the royal sorceress, Wangmu,
translation.de: "Als Instanz ewigen Lebens ist Zauberin Wangmu oft in ihrem Labor,

translation.en: can often be found in her laboratory brewing her famous Elixir of Immortality."
translation.de: "Als Instanz ewigen Lebens ist Zauberin Wangmu oft in ihrem Labor, wo sie das Elixier der Unsterblichkeit braut.

translation.en: We're back in the game! One sip and they'll have to accept me.
translation.de: Wir sind wieder am Start. Ein Schluck und ich bin drin.

translation.en: Way to go, Stick! Mwah!
You too, Pebble. What are we waiting for?
-But that's in heaven. -Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.de: -Ist im Himmel. -Der Affenkönig siegt über alles!

translation.en: Is that the Jade Palace? Absolutely.
-[Monkey King] Woo-hoo! -What the--
[Lin] There she is. Wangmu.
translation.de: Da ist sie. Wangmu, die Königin des Himmels.

translation.en: The queen of heaven.
Yeah, whatever. Let's go make me immortal.

translation.en: Locked.
No. No, no, no! Monkey!
Somewhere in this room are the ingredients for making the Elixir of Immortality.

translation.en: -Guess I'll just have to taste everything. -No. No. Wait.
-First thing we need is-- -Here goes nothing.
Hey, don't drink that.
-I'm just smelling it. -[Lin] Don't smell anything.
-[Monkey King screeches] -[Lin yelps]
-Hey! -[Monkey King laughs]
[grunts] Okay, Lin. You got this.
translation.de: Ok, Lin. Du schaffst das. Schau nicht zurück.

translation.en: Don't look back. Don't look back. Don't… look… back.
translation.de: Ok, Lin. Du schaffst das. Schau nicht zurück. Schau nicht zurück!

translation.en: Aw, you're just a scared little monkey. No friends. No family.

translation.en: You are alone.
Sorry, Monkey. I can't fool around anymore.

translation.en: My people are counting on me.
-Oh! Agh! -Gee, why'd you trash this place?
translation.de: Mann! Warum hast du hier randaliert?

translation.en: -We're guests here. -[Lin groans]
translation.de: Wir sind hier Gäste. Zeig Respekt.

translation.en: Show a little respect. Immortality Elixir?
translation.de: Wir sind hier Gäste. Zeig Respekt. Elixier? Hallo? Ich bezahle dich nicht fürs Rumblödeln.

translation.en: Hello? Come on. I'm not paying you to goof around.
translation.de: Elixier? Hallo? Ich bezahle dich nicht fürs Rumblödeln.

translation.en: Yeah. Uh-huh.
-We're not actually paying her, are we? -[Stick hums]
Right. The first ingredient is…
There. A pinch of instant karma.
-Get mixing. -[woman] Stealing from an old lady? You have no honor.

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -[laughs] First, I punish you.
Then I shame you.
You can't shame me.
I have no shame.
And you have no exit.
Don't worry, kid. I'll take care of her.
Eat lightning, chimp! [laughs]
Immortality Elixir! Let's go!
A spoonful of chi. There! The blue jar. A spoonful of chi coming up.
translation.de: -Ein Löffel Chi! Da! Der blaue Krug. -Chi. Kommt sofort!

translation.en: -[Monkey King] What's next? -A drop of moon essence. The green jar.
-Bad monkey! -[Monkey King] On it.
Ha! Missed!
Yes!
-That's it. -[Monkey] What else?
Last one. Nectar of peach. Yes! Um…
-Yes! -[Wangmu growls]
-Here you go. -[Wangmu] This is going to sting!
You call yourself a god? I'm so disappointed. What a bummer.

translation.en: Um, it's stuck! I-I need a spoon or chopsticks or--
translation.de: Zu zäh. Ich brauche Löffel, Stäbchen oder…

translation.en: -Stick, help her. -[Stick yells]
-Perfect. -[Monkey King] Ha ha!
I think I did it!
-Taste this. [grunts] -Right.
Taste death!
That does it! [grunts]
[Monkey King] Nice punch, Grandma!
Your friend's not here to protect you now. [laughs]

translation.en: Uh, we're not friends. I'm his assistant. His what?
[screams] I'm just a pebble.
I'm only after his stick.
I need it to save my village from a drought.
So, the thief's assistant is also a thief. [laughs]

translation.en: Take his stick and go! The Jade Emperor will see you home.
translation.de: Nimm den Stock und geh! Der Jade-Kaiser bringt dich heim.

translation.en: What are you going to do to him?
That selfish creature doesn't care about you. Run!

translation.en: Ha ha! Stick, where are you?
-Whoa! -Back for more, Monkey?
-Uh-oh. -[panting] Don't look back!
translation.de: -Noch nicht genug, Affe? -Oh, oh. Schau nicht zurück!

translation.en: Don't look back! Don't look back.
-[Wangmu laughs] -No, not this time.
Goodbye, mortal.
Half-mortal.
You couldn't possibly think you were worthy to take your place here
translation.de: Du dachtest doch nicht, dass du hier bei uns Unsterblichen einen Platz einnehmen könntest.

translation.en: amongst us Immortal Ones.
translation.de: dass du hier bei uns Unsterblichen einen Platz einnehmen könntest.

translation.en: That was fun.
-Monkey! -Agh!
What?
I love it when people tell me what I can't do.

translation.en: Whoa!
My lightning makes you stronger?
translation.de: Meine Blitze machen dich noch stärker?

translation.en: I'm immortal!
And huge!
I'm one of you now.
You will never be one of us!

translation.en: -Monkey! -Who's gonna stop me? I summon the Immortal Ones!

translation.en: -I'm already here! -[Lin] They're coming!
-We gotta get out of here! -What are they gonna do? I can't die.

translation.en: There are fates far worse than death.
translation.de: Es gibt schlimmere Schicksale als den Tod.

translation.en: We really should go now.
Bring 'em on! I am a god.
translation.de: Hol sie her! Ich bin ein Gott.

translation.en: -Monkey! -What? I'm busy!
Bet you can't catch me.
Monkey King!
He's coming. He's coming. He's coming.
He's not coming!
You came back for me.
translation.de: Er ist gekommen, um mich zu retten.

translation.en: -What's your deal? -You came back for me!
I so could've beaten that old lady.
-But you didn't because you care. -No.
-Admit it. You care. Say it. -No!
-Say, "I care." -Never.
-Come on, admit it! -I admit nothing!
He so cares about me. -[Stick murmurs] -I know!
translation.de: Ich bin ihm so was von wichtig. Ich weiß!

translation.en: He was all like, "We're not family. You're a tiny pebble."
translation.de: Er so: "Wir sind keine Familie. Ein Kieselstein bist du."

translation.en: -And then he saves me! [laughs] -[Stick laughs]
Are you two done? 'Cause I got to get to the Jade Palace.
-To do what? -Defeat all the Immortal Ones.
Then I'll become their ruler, the new king of heaven.

translation.en: Wait. Are you sure? Sounds kinda crazy.
Yep! Whatever the Monkey King does, he does big!
translation.de: -Warte. Sicher? Klingt verrückt. -Ja! Wenn der Affenkönig was tut, dann richtig!

translation.en: -And you won't ever stop? -Not until the day I die.
-Which is? -Never! I'm immortal!
My thirst for new challenges will never end. I'll never be satisfied. I'll never be fulfilled.
translation.de: Ich suche neue Herausforderungen, werde nie zufrieden sein, nie erfüllt.

translation.en: Which, when I say it out loud, sounds incredibly depressing.
translation.de: Was, wenn ich es laut sage, super deprimierend klingt.

translation.en: Wow! Did I just curse myself?
translation.de: Wow! Hab ich mich selbst verflucht?

translation.en: Maybe defeating everyone isn't always the answer.
translation.de: Alle besiegen ist vielleicht nicht immer die Antwort.

translation.en: Maybe you'd find happiness by,
translation.de: Vielleicht findest du dein Glück, indem du…

translation.en: I don't know, helping other people? -That could be your new, uh, path. -Hm.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, indem du anderen hilfst. Könnte dein neuer Weg sein.

translation.en: Say you could save a starving village by lending out the stick for--

translation.en: My stick? Okay. How about I rip off my tail and give that away too? I mean, come on.
translation.de: Meinen? Vielleicht reiße ich mir auch den Schwanz ab. Komm!

translation.en: You could save the lives of so many.
Hard pass. Me and Stick are meant for way bigger things.
translation.de: Auf keinen Fall. Ich und Stock sind für Größeres bestimmt.

translation.en: You wanna be happy, you help people.
translation.de: Wenn es dich glücklich macht, hilf du.

translation.en: You can do great things. I'm just a mortal.
translation.de: Du kannst Großes leisten. Ich bin nur eine Sterbliche.

translation.en: You're the only mortal I know who's gone to hell and heaven in one day.
translation.de: Die Einzige, die an einem Tag in Hölle und Himmel war.

translation.en: That wasn't my accomplishment. That was you.
translation.de: Das war nicht mein Verdienst. Das warst du.

translation.en: When we were in hell, I read my scroll.
translation.de: In der Hölle las ich meine Schriftrolle.

translation.en: It said, "Lin, common peasant girl." "Tried to make a difference. Never did."
translation.de: Da stand: "Lin, einfaches Bauernmädchen. Wollte was bewirken. Hat's nie geschafft."

translation.en: [sighs] Does it have to end that way?
I don't know. Who's Lin?
I'm Lin.
Oh! Hey, Lin. Monkey King. Nice to meet ya.
translation.de: Oh! Hey, Lin. Affenkönig. Freut mich sehr.

translation.en: Pleasure.
Buck up, Lin. No one thought I could make a difference, right?
translation.de: Kopf hoch. Von mir dachte das auch keiner. Und jetzt?

translation.en: But now look at me. The original outsider.
translation.de: Kopf hoch. Von mir dachte das auch keiner. Und jetzt? Der einstige Außenseiter. Unsterblich!

translation.en: Fully immortal!
So don't let anyone,
god, demon, old monkeys,
challenge you or stand in your way.
You want something,
don't ask.
-Just take it. -[Stick grunts]
-I've got a challenge. -Go on.
-It's a big one. -I'm listening.
How long do you think an immortal monkey can hold his breath under that water?
translation.de: Wie lange kann ein unsterblicher Affe unter Wasser die Luft anhalten?

translation.en: Interesting.
I dunno. Two, three years! [inhales deeply]
Don't be sad. You've done good, girl.
translation.de: Sei nicht traurig. Das hast du gut gemacht.

translation.en: Go home. Your storm is coming.
Ah, I wasn't gonna make you wait the whole three.
translation.de: Ich hätte dich nicht drei Jahre warten lassen.

translation.en: Forget it. Come on. Grab Stick, and we'll--
-Where's Stick? -I had no choice.
-He just needs to borrow it. -Borrow it?
-Where did you get that? -The Dragon King just--
Dragon King?
My village is dying. My family is dying. The Dragon King can help them.
translation.de: Mein Dorf stirbt. Meine Familie stirbt. Der Drachen-König kann helfen.

translation.en: I trusted you, Lin. I saved you.
translation.de: Ich hab dir vertraut. Dich gerettet.

translation.en: I saved you first. And I asked for your help.
translation.de: Ich dich zuerst. Und bat dich um Hilfe.

translation.en: You said if I want something, don't ask. Just take it. -That's what you said. -[Monkey King growls]
translation.de: Du sagtest, wenn ich was will, nicht fragen, nehmen. Deine Worte.

translation.en: I had to do it.
Well, hello, you.
That stick belongs to me!
Stickipoo here had a momentary fling,
translation.de: Stockilein hatte nur eine temporäre Affäre,

translation.en: but now he's come home.
In fact, he'll be the guest of honor at my celebration tonight.
translation.de: Er wird sogar der Ehrengast auf meiner Feier heute Abend sein.

translation.en: Invite only.
And a warm thanks to you for the help, my child.
translation.de: Und allerherzlichsten Dank für deine Hilfe, Kleine.

translation.en: Tell your village the drought is over.
translation.de: Sag deinem Dorf, die Dürre ist nun vorbei.

translation.en: It's all over.
For you, your people, and the entire world!
translation.de: Für dich, deine Familie und die ganze Welt!

translation.en: The world?
No, we have to stop him.
-You betrayed me! -I had no choice.
-We're still family, right? -I have no family.
translation.de: -Wir sind noch Familie, oder? -Ich habe keine.

translation.en: -I'll help you get Stick back. -Help me?
You? An insignificant pebble?
This monkey heroes alone!
I'll show you crazy.
translation.de: Ich zeig dir, was verrückt ist.

translation.en: Monkey!
But he destroyed my home.
Oh, Wangmu, if you can't stop a little monkey from smashing your roof--
translation.de: Wangmu, wenn du ein Äffchen nicht davon abhalten kannst, dein Dach zu…

translation.en: [Babbo] Coming to the stage…
[Benbo] To finally kick off his world domination tour…
translation.de: Um endlich seine Weltherrschafts-Tour zu starten…

translation.en: He's flashy.
He's splashy. But don't mention his rashy.
[Benbo] Put your fins and tentacles together for…
translation.de: Klatscht in eure Flossen und Tentakel für…

translation.en: [Babbo and Benbo] The Dragon King!

♪ To the air-breathing Land-walking sun kissers I despise? ♪

translation.en: ♪ By storm ♪
Salutations, dry-landers!
Who wants the honor of drowning first?
-[Monkey King] Flaky! -Huh? Where's my Stick?
translation.de: Hey, Schuppe! Wo ist mein Stock?

translation.en: I believe I said invite only!
translation.de: Ich glaube, ich sagte, nur für geladene Gäste!

translation.en: What do we do now?
I am the mighty Dragon King,
world-flooder, man-slayer--
Monkey punching-bag!
-Stop it! -Yeah!
Knock it off!
Monkey!
[Dragon King grunts] Stop!
-[Lin] I got ya. Head for high ground! -[child] Mama! Everybody, get to the top of the hill!
translation.de: Ich hab dich. Lauft nach oben! Ihr müsst auf den Berggipfel!

translation.en: Stop wrecking my clones!
-Monkey! You're not alone. I can help you! -[Monkey King snarls]
translation.de: Affe! Du bist nicht allein! Ich kann helfen!

translation.en: [Dragon King groans] Gotcha!
-[dramatic music plays] -Why won't you die?
I'm immortal, dummy!
How?
Those peaches were fake!
-[Lin] Dragon! -What?
-Your Majesty! -What?
[Lin] Spare my poor village, and I'll tell you his weakness.
translation.de: Verschont mein Dorf, und ich verrate seine Schwäche.

translation.en: Agreed.
Lightning. It's the only thing that can defeat him.
translation.de: Blitze. Nur damit kann man ihn besiegen.

translation.en: Fry him up. No one'll miss him.
-Jia you! Jia you! -[Monkey King grunts]
-Stick? -[Stick hums]
[Babbo] Oh no, not again!
-I missed you so much. -[Stick murmurs]
Thanks for the assist, child.
I'm not your assistant!
I'm his. What?
This is so twisted!
Yes! That's it! Wring him out!
Monkey?
Okay, you can have the stick!
How about I get custody just on weekends?
translation.de: Kann ich ihn vielleicht an den Wochenenden sehen?

translation.en: Are we fired? Oh yeah, we need a new career.
translation.de: -Sind wir gefeuert? -Ja. Wir sind auf Jobsuche.

translation.en: You did it. You defeated the Dragon King-- Monkey King reigns supreme!
translation.de: -Ja! Du hast den Drachen-König… -Der Affenkönig siegt über alles!

translation.en: Uh-oh.
Sir, you, uh…
[sighs] What is it now?
You're next.
[Jade Emperor] This has gone too far.
Hand me the Royal Horn of Desperation.
translation.de: Gebt mir das kaiserliche Horn der Verzweiflung.

translation.en: But the Buddha said to let him find his own way. [scoffs] The Buddha speaks in riddles. No one understands him.
translation.de: -Buddha sagt, wir sollen ihn lassen. -Der spricht in Rätseln. Unverständlich.

translation.en: This ends now! Monkey!
You shall spend your immortality alone,
translation.de: Du wirst deine Unsterblichkeit allein verbringen

translation.en: reflecting on your crimes.
My crimes? You could have accepted me.
translation.de: Meine Verbrechen? Ihr hättet mich akzeptieren können!

translation.en: Now I will reign supreme over all of you!
translation.de: Jetzt aber werde ich die Herrschaft über euch alle antreten!

translation.en: Monkey! Stop!
-[Yama] Monkey! -[Monkey King laughs]
Monkey! Monkey!
It's me! It's Lin!
-[Monkey King growls] -Please, you have to stop.
No, Monkey!
♪ Who's the giant primate Who is making a mess? Monkey King! ♪
translation.de: Wer ist der Primat, der Chaos macht? Affenkönig!

translation.en: I did this. I let this happen.
translation.de: Ich war das. Das ist meine Schuld.

translation.en: [Monkey King] ♪ Monkey King! ♪ ♪ Who can swing around The biggest stick… ♪
translation.de: Affenkönig! Wer schwingt den allmächtigen Stock?

translation.en: Please, he's not evil.
-[Monkey King laughs] -[Lin] He has goodness inside him.
He does care. [Buddha] Then help him find his way.
translation.de: -Ihm ist nicht alles egal. -Dann hilf ihm, seinen Weg zu finden.

translation.en: [Lin] What's happening?
[Buddha] Enlighten him.
What? But how do I do that?
translation.de: Was? Aber wie mache ich das?

translation.en: Monkey King, stop!
Oh, whoa.
[deep voice] Monkey King, stop!
Monkey King is my old title.
You will address me as the Great Sage,
translation.de: Sprich mich an mit Großer Weiser,

translation.en: equal of heaven!
How can we show him he's not the center of the universe?
translation.de: Wie erkennt er, er ist nicht das Zentrum des Universums?

translation.en: I got it! [deep voice] I have a challenge for you, Great Sage.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wie! Ich habe eine Herausforderung für dich, Großer Weiser.

translation.en: Not interested!
-What is it? -[Lin as Buddha] Something worthy of you.
The ultimate challenge.
What gives?
[Lin as Buddha] If you are powerful enough to leap from my palm,
translation.de: Wenn du mächtig genug bist, um von meiner Handfläche zu springen,

translation.en: the kingdom of heaven will be yours to rule.
translation.de: wird die Herrschaft über den Himmel dein sein.

translation.en: Hang on. What did he just say?
[deep voice] But if you fail, you will do a long penance here on Earth.
translation.de: Versagst du aber, wirst du lange Buße auf der Erde tun.

translation.en: Please. Too easy! [laughs]
I just have to leave your hand?
You're on, but you're gonna feel pretty foolish in about two sec…
translation.de: Ok. Aber du wirst dir gleich ziemlich doof vorkommen…

translation.en: Cloud jump!
-[cat yelps] -I really hate that monkey.
This is the edge of the universe, Stick!
translation.de: Das ist der Rand des Universums, Stock!

translation.en: -[Stick squeals] -[Monkey King] I rule!
Yeah, I totally should. Just to prove I was here.
translation.de: Als Beweis, dass ich hier war.

translation.en: Ha ha! And now to make my other mark.
translation.de: Und nun gibt es noch eine andere Markierung.

translation.en: -[Monkey King sighs] -[Lin as Buddha] Stop that, Monkey.
Uh, the Great Sage.
[Lin as Buddha] You never left my hand, Monkey King.
translation.de: Du hast meine Hand nie verlassen. -Was? -Affenkönig.

translation.en: Wait a second. No! No. No, no, no, no, no! No! No!
Whatever just happened, that's cheating! Do-over!
translation.de: Wie auch immer, das war geschummelt. Noch mal!

translation.en: Hard pass.
-Pebble? -[Lin laughs]
-Are you even supposed to be in there? -Absolutely not. Isn't it great?
translation.de: Kieselstein? Darfst du das überhaupt? Absolut nicht. Toll, oder?

translation.en: You tricked me! Not fair! That's two against one.
translation.de: Das war eine Falle! Unfair! Zwei gegen einen.

translation.en: I'm sorry. This is the only way to help you. Stop! No, no, no, no, no! No! [strains]
translation.de: -Sorry. Nur so ist dir zu helfen. -Halt! Nein.

translation.en: No! Stick!
Well, guess what?
[grunts] This is so exactly what I wanted to happen.
translation.de: Das ist genau, was ich wollte.

translation.en: Told you, you'd feel foolish. Ha ha.
translation.de: Nun kommst du dir doof vor.

translation.en: [Buddha] Monkey King,
you are now on the path of meditation and self-reflection.
translation.de: du befindest dich nun auf dem Pfad der Meditation und Selbst-Reflexion.

translation.en: I was born from a rock, you know?
translation.de: Ein Stein brachte mich zur Welt.

translation.en: This is where I thrive! Monkey King reigns supreme! [strains]
translation.de: Hier fühle ich mich wohl! Der Affenkönig siegt über alles!

translation.en: [Buddha] When you awake to nothingness,
you will have found your way.
translation.de: wirst du deinen Weg gefunden haben.

translation.en: Awake to nothingness.
Whatever that means.
I'll think about it.
He's just a little monkey looking for a place to belong.
translation.de: Er ist nur ein Affe, der einen Ort sucht, wo er hingehört.

translation.en: [Buddha] The Monkey King's scroll
is still to be written.
When he is ready,
the world will need him
as it has needed you.
translation.de: So wie sie dich gebraucht hat.

translation.en: Hey, Lin, where's our hero going today? I'll be back by sunset.
translation.de: -Lin! Wo will die Heldin hin? -Bin vor der Dämmerung zurück.

translation.en: [Babbo] And two extra-large milk tea bobas.
Want honey with that? I made it myself.
translation.de: Honig? Den hab ich selbst gemacht.

translation.en: My gosh! How do I awaken to nothingness?
translation.de: Manno! Wie erwacht man denn im Nichts?

translation.en: What does that even mean?
Be calm? Patient? Humble?
I'm the king of being humble! [Lin] Monkey?
Monkey.
Go away! I'm busy thinking of all the ways to get back at you.
translation.de: Geh weg! Ich überlege gerade, wie ich mich an dir rächen kann.

translation.en: Calmly.
I came to say goodbye before Buddha closes up your mountain.
translation.de: Ich wollte mich verabschieden, ehe Buddha den Berg verschließt.

translation.en: Oh, lucky me.
I know you're mad, but you were out of control.
translation.de: Du bist sauer, aber du warst irre.

translation.en: [groans] Okay, you don't have to remind me.
Taking on all the gods probably wasn't my best idea.
translation.de: Alle Götter aufzubringen, war wohl nicht so clever.

translation.en: I really messed up, didn't I?
Monkey, you were born from a rock,
translation.de: Affe, ein Stein brachte dich zur Welt,

translation.en: abandoned by everyone.
Th-The gods hated you,
and all you ever wanted was to be loved.
translation.de: Und alles, was du je wolltest, war, geliebt zu werden.

translation.en: [Lin] And you are!
You changed my life. I made a difference. We both did.
translation.de: Du hast mein Leben verändert. Ich hab was bewirkt. Wir beide.

translation.en: I really am your number one fan.
Well, I guess a little pebble did make a big wave.
translation.de: Da löste ein Kieselstein doch eine große Welle aus.

translation.en: With an assist.
Oh, that's good.
Me, your assistant?
Okay. Okay. We helped each other.
Well, we didn't do it all alone.
translation.de: Tja, und wir waren nicht allein.

translation.en: Stick! Buddy! I missed you so much!
translation.de: Stock. Kumpel! Ich habe dich so vermisst.

translation.en: The team is back.
I guess this is goodbye.
Wait, don't go yet. [grunts]
Thank you for everything.
I'll miss you, Monkey.
Keep writing your scroll, Lin.
I will.
[Lin] I kept my promise and did great things.
translation.de: Ich hielt mein Versprechen, tat Großes.

translation.en: And Monkey, I'm sure he'll be out in no time.
translation.de: Und Affe wird sicher bald rauskommen.

translation.en: Monkey, demons run wild across the land.
translation.de: Affe, Dämonen laufen durch das Land.

translation.en: The Buddha sent us to release you. Are you ready to join our journey to the West?
translation.de: Buddha schickte uns, um dich freizulassen. Bereit für unsere Reise in den Westen?

translation.en: I have awoken with peace in my heart,
translation.de: Ich erwachte mit Frieden im Herzen,

translation.en: and you wish for me to fight?
translation.de: und du willst, dass ich kämpfe?

translation.en: Well, yes, but--
Come on, Stick. The world needs us.
translation.de: Komm schon, Stock. Die Welt braucht uns.

translation.en: Huh? Oh no!
